<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Knockdown](/Feats.aspx?ID=403) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=68) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Knockdown](/Feats.aspx?ID=372)

</column>

---

You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow. When you use Knockdown, instead of making a Strike followed by a [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), you can attempt a single Strike. If you do and your Strike hits, instead of rolling a check for your Trip attempt, you automatically apply the critical success effect of a Trip. If you used a two-handed melee weapon for the Strike, you can use the weapon's damage die size instead of the regular die size for the damage from a critical Trip.
name: Improved Knockdown
